info.institution: Dipartimento di Scienze Teoriche ed Applicate (DiSTA)
info.summary:
Claudio Gentile works as a Associate Professor in Dipartimento di Scienze Teoriche ed Applicate (DiSTA), and his\her h-index is 24, g-index is 50. His\Her interests are :
 Stable Set Polytope; Claw-free Graph; Active Learning; Gear Composition; Link Classification;
